text: Must try their garlic bread and don't forget to try that heavenly topping !Pizzas are okay from a pre made base pizza base standards. not too great.
Not a great choice of pizzas available. However, the quality of toppings is good. It's OK for a quick bite.
Decent but not worth going again
Value for money, excellent topping in such a less amount of money
Good for garlic bread...value for money.
